attributes.action: Stop giving extra benefits to addicts such as Alchoholics and Herion addicts.
attributes.additional_details: The pubs are full of BUMS all day everyday, why will they ever get a job if they can stay in free accomodation and get extra funds to drink all day every day. You only have to go to the local pub to see this for yourself. JOB SEEKERS ALLOWANCE DONT MAKE ME LAUGH.....
